phrases: There are several rules you must follow while traveling outside of Luna Nova.
Just because you will not be on campus does not mean you may forget your status as students.
Act with dignity and virtue at all times!
You must be noble and upright at all times.
So it is all about eating for you, Akko?
Akko, you just want to eat food?
First, do not take any action that would not befit the pride of a Luna Nova student.
You are not in the position to take responsibility for causing an issue of that sort.
If you because an incident, you would not have the proper means to take responsibility.
It is a long boot I bought by mail order.
Look, these poor students all look like you have been lecturing them since the second century.
See, all of the poor students look like you have been lecturing them since the second century.
Say, would you look at this, Professor Ursula?
Try it on, I am certain it will look becoming on you.
Say, is not this interesting, Professor Ursula?
Try it on, I am certain it will look becoming on you.
Ah no, no, no, I am afraid it is not.
No, no, no, no it is not.
An amulet must be something with emotional value.
It is a charm that will get you home safely.
Just the thought of it should be enough to compel you to return.
I thought we were going to the city!
We only ended up here because you said it was a shortcut.
You can only find these grave blushers growing in cemeteries.
So creepy... feels like a ghost is about to pop up.
How creepy, it feels like a ghost might appear.
Besides, the graves were not even fixed.
I could outrun one of them any day of the week!
I will have that scum caught before he knows it!
You witches brought me back to life.
I cannot remember a single thing.
And it is pointless trying to remember now!
Being reanimated is more than enough.
I have got two legs, two arms, and a head.
I will slice him in two like I did to this tomb!
Now, it is time for revenge, revenge!
Your magic and Sucy's mushroom must have meshed to make him rise from his grave!
You mean we revived some dead guy?
Is not that a super bad thing?
You mean we revived a dead guy?
Is not that the super bad thing?
Well if it is not the witch girls.
I will remember once I get a good look.
That is was our street performance!
What you see here is a miracle witnessed only once in a thousand years!
Witness here a miracle seen only once in a millennium!
A medieval swordsman, back from the afterlife to strike down his archenemy!
A knight from the Middle Ages has come back from the afterlife to strike down his archnemesis!
And on your right is the witch girl!
In pursuit of this man, she as well climbed out of the depths of hell to break his curse.
She followed this man out of the depths of hell in order to break his curse!
Want to hear how the story goes on?
Then leave us your wish, neatly folded up, in that hat!
If you cannot wait to hear more, please fold up your wishes and put them in this hat.
Did you just call me bub?
You are a bunch of smarmy thieves!
Easier to bring him back to the graveyard, now.
Witches are the symbol of wisdom, the pride of humanity!
That shop took in everything that used to be here.
That is why we accepted everything they owned.
After he send Miranda off to school, he never saw her again!
It could be anywhere after all this time.
This view makes all of my worries feel so small.
She used to play here all the time!
That is why when her enrollment was decided,
That is why, when her enrollment was decided,
I turned it into a magic staff that could be used as her amulet so she would never feel homesick!
Not only did you use magic outside school grounds, you brought the dead back to life.
As punishment, you will overhaul all of the brooms in the equipment repair room.
As punishment, you will repair all of the brooms in the equipment repair room.
We will never be able to finish this!
I thought she was being nice, but it was the opposite!
That means witches had to do everything.
There are several rules you must adhere to while traveling outside of Luna Nova.
Do not even for a second think that you may disregard your duties as students once you are off the campus.
Let us go eat pie, and cake, and parfaits too!
Act with dignity and virtue at all times.
Akko, your head is full of food.
First, abstain from any activity that would ill befit the pride of a Luna Nova student.
Second, do not use any magic.
You are not in a position to take responsibility for causing an issue.
It is a long boot I bought through mail order.
You can even wear it as a hat!
Goodness, no need to be so stiff.
See, these poor students all look like you have been lecturing them since the second century.
I feel so bad for them.
Say, would you look at this, Professor Ursula?
Try it on, I am certain it will look becoming on you.
Have you each brought an item to use as your amulet?
Ah no, no, no, I am afraid it is not.
An amulet must carry emotional value.
It is a charm to get you home safely.
You leave it at the place you call home.
For the record, this is mine.
Just the thought of it should be compelling enough for you to return.
Show me what you have prepared.
Do not you have something you never let go of?
Here where our long journey has finally led us
Here where our long journey has finally led us
kakedashita hibi ni yukitsuita kono basho
kakedashita hibi ni yukitsuita kono basho
We can push open the door
We can push open the door
In the footsteps of our dreams far beyond the stars
In the footsteps of our dreams far beyond the stars
hoshizora no kanata yume no ashiato
hoshizora no kanata yume no ashiato
Pick up the pieces with a song
Pick up the pieces with a song
Keep the destination of your dreams nestled in your heart
Keep the destination of your dreams nestled in your heart
yume ga kaketeku basho i am about to mo kokoro ni himete
yume ga kaketeku basho i am about to mo kokoro ni himete
The landscape looks like it is burning brilliantly
The landscape looks like it is burning brilliantly
yaketsuita you ni irodzuita fuukei wa
yaketsuita you ni irodzuita fuukei wa
But you cannot see it fallen on the ground
But you cannot see it fallen on the ground
The world will keep on turning
The world will keep on turning
Embrace the moment as if it will never come again
Embrace the moment as if it will never come again
hakanai mama no i am about to wo dakishimete
hakanai mama no i am about to wo dakishimete
Let us keep walking as we are with the light in our sights
Let us keep walking as we are with the light in our sights
kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
I thought we were going to the city!
I only followed you because you said this was a shortcut.
These grave blushers can only be found growing in cemeteries.
So creepy... it feels like a ghost might appear.
Oh no, we might get cursed!
Does not it just feel like we will?
Professor Ursula taught me how to use it, so I should be able to do something.
We were even told specifically not to use magic outside of school!
Nobody's going to find out if we use it here.
You are such a worrywart, Lotte.
Besides, it did not fix the graves at all.
No cur's faster than me, try as they might!
That scum will not even see me coming!
You witchfolk brought me back to life!
I cannot remember a single thing!
And there is no point in trying to remember now!
Being back to life is plenty fine for me!
I have got two legs, two arms, and a head.
I will slice him in two, like I did with this tomb!
The time for my revenge has come!
Your magic and Sucy's mushroom must have blended together to make him rise from his grave!
You mean we revived some dead guy?
Is not that the super bad thing?
It is no good, my battery ran out.
And hey, why are not you running, Sucy?
I figured we could just leave him be.
The grave blusher's effect should wear off by sundown.
But he could still attack someone before that happens.
What is the punishment for bringing the dead back to life again?
The most agonizing and scary thing you can imagine?
It will be one hundred times as terrible as that.
We have got to catch him quick!
Why is a dead guy got to be so fast?
Well, if it is not the young witch ladies!
This might be the man I am looking for!
You do not even know what he looks like?
I will remember once I get a good look.
I am begging you, go back to your grave!
If anyone finds out about you, we will be sent to hell next!
We are the ones who brought you back!
The least you could do is listen to us!
And that was our street performance!
Yes, it was all an act!
Everyone gather round, do not be shy!
What you see here is a miracle witnessed only once a millennium!
A medieval knight, back from the afterlife to strike down his archenemy!
And on your right, a witch girl!
In pursuit of this man, she too climbed out of the depths of hell to break his curse.
Want to hear where the story goes?
Then leave us your wish, neatly folded up, in our hat!
If I am looking for trash, I should search the garbage!
How could I not have realized before?!
It is not what you think!
Grandpa's a legendary pirate, so he has to open every box he finds to check if there is treasure inside!
He is your grandfather, is he?
Tell him to refrain at once.
You folks are a bunch of smarmy thieves is what you are!
It should be somewhere in this noggin...
They will forget all about this in two hours.
It will be easier to bring him to the graveyard now.
Witches are a symbol of wisdom, the pride of humanity!
I am in a rush, so farewell!
Wait, what are you talking about?
I must find that man's house on Caliban Road!
Are you acquainted with the master of the house that once stood there?
That shop over there salvaged all that remained of it.
It was a mansion from the golden age of magic.
That is why we acquired everything they owned.
Do you actually pay attention in class?
It was about two hundred years ago.
The era after the witch hunts up until the industrial revolution.
There were no machines, so people relied on magic for everything.
We already learned about it in magic history.
I would not mind buying that military uniform too.
It is him and his wife and child!
That is the address we were just at.
This man brought misfortune onto her!
He was a normal human, but he fell in love with a witch and eloped!
His wife passed away shortly after giving birth to Miranda, and he made a vow to her family!
Raise her into a proper witch!
After he sent Miranda off to school, he never saw her again!
That is why I cannot forgive him!
With one swirl of her staff above her head, she gathered light to make the sun and moon.
Droplets of magic expanded into the stars and Milky Way.
With one swirl of her staff above her head, she gathered light to make the sun and moon.
Droplets of magic expanded into the stars and Milky Way.
Seeing everyone is idol brings back memories.
Where is the rest of it?
I wonder if it still exists.
It could be anywhere, after all this time.
Shall we take a stroll outside?
Show your face, you wretched toad!
This view makes all of my worries feel trivial.
Like how you are bound for the underworld?
I wonder if this bell is out of use.
It is missing that thing inside.
The rod that rings the bell.
That is right, that is right, that is right!
The man I detested was myself!
She used to play here all the time!
That is why when her enrollment was decided,
I made her a staff out of the bell's tongue!
I turned it into a magic staff that could double as an amulet, all so she would never feel homesick!
But then I went and died...
The tears are starting to flow!
I saw it on her staff!
Her staff has the same symbol on it.
Let us go to Luna Nova!
I am the one who brought you back to life!
I will not let you die in vain!
We will never make it in time.
I thought I was going to die...
I am still younger than you are!
Nobody can tell without your flesh.
Say, there is something I want to tell you before you die again.
I have never resented you, not even once.
After working hard on my magic, I even became the headmistress.
Regrettably, it seems I am out of time.
You girls let me have a wonderful day today!
Blessings upon the future of witches!
I think I just inhaled some old man dust.
Miss Kagari, Miss Jansson, Miss Manbavaran.
Not only did you use magic outside school grounds, you also brought the dead back to life.
Do you understand what must be done?
As punishment, you will restore all of the brooms in the equipment repair room.
You are still in the middle of your training.
I expect each of you to reflect and repent on what you have done.
There is just no end to them!
Move your hands, not your mouth.
I was so wrong when I thought she was being nice!
I cannot believe there were this many broken brooms.
Hey, why do not we use restoration magic?
Anyway, I sure wish I could have lived in the golden age of magic.
Would not it be wonderful to use magic for everything?
That means witches had to do everything.
I like the times we live in too.
Even with scientific developments everywhere, there are still things only magic can be used for.
There it is, the honor student view.
A world filled with magic would be way more fun!
Not compared to how fun a world filled with mushrooms would be.
I lost sight of everything else
I lost sight of everything else

Longing to know more about this world
Longing to know more about this world
